title: The Embrace of the Beast
description: A life for a life.  Innocence lost.  When beautiful, innocent Isabelle saves her father's life by offering her own, she is confronted by a beast, whose selfishness and loneliness have made him less and less of a man. To save her father, Isabelle must agree to share his castle with him - and also his bed, his dungeon, and everywhere else he desires. Yet as Isabelle's eyes are opened, there is something in his particular desires that she finds compelling.  The master of the castle has already been alone for a century, and believed he was doomed to remain so forever. When the most alluring woman he has ever seen steps into his castle and promises to remain, he has to fight to control the beast inside himself.  Is Isabelle truly safe? Can she be his salvation? And can a beauty such as she ever find love and pleasure with such a beast?  If you like the romance and happily-ever-afters of fairy tales with the steam and intensity of bdsm, check out this novella. Based on the world of the original fairy tale, become lost in this tale of castles and enchantments, gown-ripping and dungeons, innocence lost and romance found.
